title: Bibliothe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Indian, Italian, Organic, Ayurvedic
description: Bibliothe Roma provides vegetarian Ayurvedic food with a meal-of-the-day which consisting of soup, basmati pulao, chutney, and salad. Uses organic ingredients and many items are vegan suitable - ask about dessert. Staff speak English and will accommodate dietary requests. Directions: Follow tram line toward Torre Argentina, and you'll find Via Celsa on right next to ruins from the Tempio delle Ninfe; it's near Piazza Venezia.
